instructions: Read the configuration file .codex.json located in the .codex subdirectory of the project root and follow its rules.
Create new branch codex/translate-all-to-english from main branch.
Translate all source code identifiers, strings, and documentation comments from Spanish to English.
Translate all inline comments, block comments, and documentation (e.g., JSDoc, README) to English.
Ensure translations preserve technical accuracy and coding conventions.
Do not alter logic, function signatures, or external API contracts, only text and naming.
Execute npm run format to format the code.
Execute npm run lint to lint the code.
